control_attributes.control_description: The organization: (a) Authorizes the execution of privileged commands and access to security-relevant information via remote access only for [Assignment: organization-defined needs]; and(b) Documents the rationale for such access in the security plan for the information system.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization [Selection: restricts; prohibits] the use of organization-controlled portable storage devices by authorized individuals on external information systems.

Control Statement: The organization: (a) Authorizes the execution of privileged commands and access to security-relevant information via remote access only for [Assignment: organization-defined needs]; and(b) Documents the rationale for such access in the security plan for the information system.
